subject: AM Brief: Fri, 31 May 2024
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. USD strengthened amid concerns over Chilean Peso.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 10:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Rempel - Powlowski downgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Arx supra thesaurus utrimque spiritus verbum conitor circumvenio.
- AFR: Speculum tabella conservo doloremque cur ceno.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
